api_list.name: /block_info
api_list.description: Get detailed information about a specific block
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cardanos-decentralized-api-guildnet.p.rapidapi.com/block_info"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cardanos-decentralized-api-guildnet.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

        }

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cardanos-decentralized-api-guildnet.p.rapidapi.com/tx_utxos"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cardanos-decentralized-api-guildnet.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

inputs.description: An array of UTxO inputs used by the transaction

bech32.description: A Cardano payment/base address (bech32 encoded) where funds were sent or change to be returned

allOf.description: Cardano staking address (reward account) in bech32 format

tx_index.description: Index of UTxO in the transaction

value.description: Total sum of ADA on the UTxO

outputs.description: An array of UTxO outputs created by the transaction

allOf.description: An array of UTxO inputs used by the transaction

bech32.description: A Cardano payment/base address (bech32 encoded) where funds were sent or change to be returned

allOf.description: Cardano staking address (reward account) in bech32 format

tx_index.description: Index of UTxO in the transaction

value.description: Total sum of ADA on the UTxO
